text.0: chasing with light our sin away o agni shine thou wealth on us.
text.1: may his light chase our sin away.
text.2: for goodly fields for pleasant homes for wealth we sacrifice to thee.
text.3: may his light chase our sin away.
text.4: best praiser of all these be he foremost our chiefs who sacrifice.
text.5: may his light chase our sin away.
text.6: so that thy worshippers and we thine agni in our sons may live.
text.7: may his light chase our sin away.
text.8: as everconquering agnis beams of splendour go to every side.
text.9: may his light chase our sin away.
text.10: to every side thy face is turned thou art triumphant everywhere.
text.11: may his light chase our sin away.
text.12: o thou whose face looks every way bear us past foes as in a ship.
text.13: may his light chase our sin away.
text.14: as in a ship convey thou us for our advantage oer the flood.
text.15: may his light chase our sin away.
